heading: Thursday Night
text: Cloudy with periods of rain. Lows in the low to mid 40s north, mid to upper 40s in the south. East winds 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 30 mph, and gusting to 55 mph in the advisory areas.

heading: Friday
text: Mostly cloudy. Some steadier rain possible early, mainly north, otherwise scattered to numerous showers. Highs in the low to mid 50s, but with temperatures steady or falling in the afternoon. East winds becoming southwest 10 to 15 mph, and gusting to 30 mph, and gusting to 55 mph in the advisory areas.

heading: Friday Night
text: Mostly cloudy. Scattered showers in the south, numerous north, with rain changing to snow over high terrain, with trace an inch in the hills, and 2 to 4 inches over the summits. Lows from the mid 30s to around 40. Southwest winds 10 to 20 mph and gusting 30 to 40 mph, becoming west, and gusting to 55 mph in the advisory areas.
